**About Me**

My name is Lela Sengupta. I'm a rising freshman at Tufts University interested in finance and international relations. You can take a look at my Github [here](https://github.com/lelasengupta) and reach me at [lelasen06\@gmail.com](lelasen06@gmail.com).

**About this Project**

This project compares the financial metrics of stocks in the S&P 500 by sector. My code can be found in this [repository](https://github.com/lelasengupta/snp500-metrics).

This project was created as part of [Kane's Free Data Science Bootcamp](https://bootcamp.davidkane.info).
